--------------------
Text: The Wetterhoun (FCI No.221, translated into English as the Frisian Water Dog) is a breed of dog traditionally used as a hunting dog for hunting small mammals and waterfowl in the province of Fryslan in the Netherlands.
Triplets:<The Wetterhoun
2:
--------------------
Text: Wetterhoun:  Plural of Wetterhoun is Wetterhounen in Dutch.
Triplets:<Wetterhoun
